channel.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
channel.description:
Please add the following accounts to our [Home page](https://www.whonix.org/): (if you need each social media symbol/icon just mention that so i can add them)
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/whonix?lang=en
Diaspora:
* clearnet: https://diasp.org/u/whonix * onion: http://diasporgc3d32vv4.onion/u/whonix * i2p: https://diasporg.i2p/u/whonix
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Whonix/
Tumblr:
https://whonix.tumblr.com/
- Note: someone using "whonix" as a name to his blog and i wonder if thats has any violate to our terms, blog is: (not https) whonix-blog.tumblr.com
these are the most active accounts.

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
In the footer ( https://forums.whonix.org/uploads/default/original/2X/c/cea6ceb78278d6d54a7835de41afc4abd8a0d559.png ) however should only be a selection.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Official_Whonix_Online_Profiles is a list of all for evidence which are real accounts by Whonix and which are fake accounts.

Read full topic
item.source: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
please take each symbol of the social media and replace it with our account. maybe also it would be nice to add these links as to whonix-tbb welcome page at the bottom.

  • But firstly our website: should be change to “Join us and Share Whonix with your Friends” or only “Join Us” ,etc

  • Then as well whonix-tbb welcome page:

  • Social media we are currently using:
Whonix

Official Whonix Online Profiles

Twitter, Facebook, G+ and other Official Social Network Profiles by Whonix

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Patrick:

You mean under Share Whonix with your Friends: …?

yes, or we remove sharing link and put the direct links to our accounts for each social media that we support.

item.description:
0brand:

Look! Facebook has an .onion site because user privacy is their number 1 priority. Really! Errr…Why does it seem like no one believes me?

well maybe u r using Facebook different than our Facebook which made inside the surveillance state of America…

Read full topic
item.source: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You mean under Share Whonix with your Friends:…?

  • Are you proposing to add “share Whonix on Diaspora” and “share Whonix on Tumblr” links there?
  • Or are you proposing to link to Whonix’s social media profiles from
    Whonix’s website?

Related:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:Stay_tuned#Social_Media_Profiles
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Official_Whonix_Online_Profiles

Read full topic
item.source: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Social media links yes, but no onions on the homepage. Use case too
obscure and too much clutter (main point is usability).

Read full topic
item.source: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page

item.title: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

Facebook:

Look! Facebook has an .onion site because user privacy is their number 1 priority. Really! Errr…Why does it seem like no one believes me?

Facebook is making it easier for users of the Tor anonymising service to access the social network, by launching a .onion address.

The company is describing it as “a way to access Facebook through Tor without losing the cryptographic protections provided by the Tor cloud”, in an effort to convince Tor users that their anonymity will be maintained.

https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2014/oct/31/facebook-anonymous-tor-users-onion

May want to add this Facebook/Whonix address to home page?

https://www.facebookcorewwwi.onion/whonix

Read full topic
item.source: Add Whonix social media accounts to Home page

https://whonix.tumblr.com/
